name: Food Rains (Minigame)
description:
Prototype of a mini-game  mainly designed for Android based on a funny idea to practice programming skills and research about Android development.

The prototype was developed in Unity using C# and free itch.io assets (credits to authors added in the game). And some of assets using Photoshop and Aseprite.

Gameplay:

The game consists of catching the type of food that appears randomly in the box in the top right corner. If you catch the correct food you will get points, however if you catch the wrong type of food you will lose lives.

You can choose three types of differents characters for play, each with different stats. Choose the one that best suits your style!
